ul.li: Entries labelled SNAPSHOT are NOT official releases.
Commons SCXML has had no official releases.

release.action: Site overhaul according to recent discussions on the commons-dev mailing list.
Decouple SCXML engine from the SCXML execution semantics; make SCXML semantics pluggable.
Added UML state machine diagrams to the usecases section of the website.

Added documentation on usecases to website:
Usecase 1: To configure instances of the RDC group container.
Usecase 2: To describe Shale dialogs.

Added API notes to website:
SCXML digester
SCXML engine
Firing events on an SCXML engine
Standalone testing
Fun with EL
Updated dependency information to indicate purpose of dependency (core, test, usecases etc.).
Added Commons look and feel (navigation bar) to website.
Added second usecase for Commons SCXML (within ASF projects). Demonstrated the use of SCXML documents for describing Shale dialogs.
Add a faces package for JSF-based environments (env.faces)
Updated ant build file to include MyFaces dependency (usecases only).

release.description: Out of the box interfaces impls

ol.li: Added simple loggers that implement ErrorHandler, ErrorReporter and SCXMLListener.
Added a SimpleContext that wraps a variables (name->value) Map.

release.action: VariableResolver#resolveVariable() should return null if variable is not found instead of throwing an exception (in ELEvaluator.java)
The scxml.env package has a new child jsp package, to distribute the current contents of the env package such that each supported environment can get its own package in the source.

Enhanced the Standalone testing functionality to enable:
Value change events on the current Context.
Dummy events to re-evaluate conditionals on event-less transitions.
Now handling outgoing transitions from a Parallel (Section 3.4 SCXML WD)
Minor Javadoc tweaks
"Microwave" test samples reset timer on leaving "cooking" state so state machines can be re-run many times (without a "reset")
Updated Commons SCXML logo.

Use a customized set of checkstyle rules. These are the Sun checks with three changes as discussed on the dev list:
Use a regexp header check for ASL
Disable 'hide a field' check (lot of noise from setters)
Disable 'method design for extension' check
Six minor code changes based on FindBugs reports.

release.description: Switch to new ant build file
release.action: Switch to new ant build file that will work better for the Commons nightlies.
RootContext (used in the JSP environment) should override ELContext#has(String) method.
Enhanced couple of samples used by the test cases.
Added JUnit Test Framework.
Upgraded Digester version in project dependencies to 1.7.
Added BeanUtils 1.7.0 dependency as needed by Digester.
Corrected year of inception in License.
Corrected some 1500+ checkstyle errors.
This changes document added.
Initial SCXML codebase copied from the RDC Taglib codebase (part of Jakarta Taglibs Proper).
Initial build artifacts, STATUS and PROPOSAL documents.
